item.title: 485. Max Consecutive Ones
item.description: Here is my thought process and solutions for Leetcode problem 485. Max Consecutive Ones . Given a binary array nums, return the maximum number of consecutive 1’s in the array. You need to do three things to solve this problem: Determine if the current index is a 1 or a 0 Find the index ranges with consecutive 1s Compare these index ranges to find the range with the maximum length Return the length of that range I solved this problem in: Python3, Javascript, mySQL, and Java:
